pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1

definition: Luoshan county in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan

sentences.english: This article is the research ofluoshan puppet from cultural aspect.
sentences.chinese: 本文是從文化學的層面對羅山皮影戲進行研究。

sentences.english: This has created an unexpectedly profitable market for Roshan.
sentences.chinese: 這爲羅山帶來了出乎意料的贏利市場。

sentences.english: Amboseli sits on the lower slopes of mighty Mount Kilimanjaro - Africa's highest - whose peak lies across the border in Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 安博西利位於非洲最頂峯乞力馬扎羅山的緩坡面。

sentences.english: The Soul Mountain Temple begin built in Tan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 靈山寺位於河南省羅山縣，始建於唐朝。

sentences.english: Back on the mainland, take a bus to Moshi at the foot of Kilimanjaro.
sentences.chinese: 回到大陸，搭乘巴士去乞力馬扎羅山腳下的莫希。

sentences.english: The threat to Roshan was already a matter of record.
sentences.chinese: 而塔利班對羅山通訊的威脅卻是有據可查的。
她還攀登了乞力馬扎羅山。

sentences.english: Tell me, how long you been walking for?
sentences.chinese: 維克羅山國家公園告訴我，你走了多久了？

sentences.english: Nor do the authors appear to have contacted the Roshan network to air their suspicions.
sentences.chinese: 報告作者也沒有接觸過羅山通訊並提出他們的懷疑。
